introductions: Oh, honey!  You're such a dear for looking into this case for poor old [Victim]. | Let me know if I can get you anything to keep up your energy; anything at all! | Kindness pays for kindness, afterall.  Wouldn't you say, dearie?
openers: Welcome back, dearie.  Can I get you anything?  You look positively famished!
You look starved, dearie.  You shouldn't work so hard.
Dearie, take a break.  You seem like you need it.
closers: Leaving already?  You should really stay and rest more, dearie.
Need to go?  Well, then come back later for some cake, dearie!
You should smile more, dearie.  Things aren't as bad as they seem.
startHintYes: Oh, how horrid!  I can't believe that someone would do such a thing! | I'd hate to mention anyone by name, but it's the only place I can think to start, dear. | I think that [Suspect] has [Weapon].  Just please don't tell [Suspect] that I brought that up!
startHintNo: Oh, how horrid!  I can't believe that someone would do such a thing! | I'm so sorry, honey.  I would have no idea where to start on this case.
genericDontKnow: Oh no, sorry dearie.  I haven't a clue.
